name: PB_PMT_PLAN_HX
description: This table stores PB Payment Plan history items.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PLAN_START_DATE
columns.description: This item will store historical data of when payment plan started.

columns.name: PLAN_END_DATE
columns.description: This item will store historical data of when payment plan ended.

columns.name: MISSED_PMT_CNT
columns.description: This item will store the total number of missed payment plan payments.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_PMT_ID
columns.description: This item will store historical data of scheduled payment record associated with the guarantor's payment plans.
